meanings.definition: A type of white blood cell that lacks granules in its cytoplasm.
meanings.sent1: The agranulocyte helps fight off infections.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study agranulocytes to understand the immune system better.
meanings.sent3: The agranulocyte decided to throw a party in its cytoplasm.
meanings.sent4: In the battlefield of the body, the agranulocyte stands strong without granular armor.
meanings.sent5: The agranulocyte, like a brave soldier, patrols the bloodstream for invaders.

meanings.definition: Agranulocytes are an important component of the immune system.
meanings.sent1: An agranulocyte works together with other cells to protect the body.
meanings.sent2: The immune system relies on agranulocytes to keep us healthy.
meanings.sent3: The agranulocyte threw a surprise party for the immune system.
meanings.sent4: Like silent heroes, agranulocytes defend our bodies without fanfare.
meanings.sent5: The agranulocyte is the unsung hero of the immune system, always ready to fight off threats.

meanings.sent1: Lymphocytes and monocytes are types of agranulocytes.
meanings.sent2: Agranulocytes like lymphocytes and monocytes play different roles in immunity.
meanings.sent3: The lymphocyte and monocyte, two agranulocytes, went for a stroll in the body.
meanings.sent4: In the army of blood cells, lymphocytes and monocytes are the elite agranulocyte troops.
meanings.sent5: Lymphocytes and monocytes, the agranulocyte duo, team up to defend the body against threats.
